text: quality and QA person and QC person and then the jobs are added by the project manager.
Okay, so now like tasks are different type of activities or you can say different type of users have different responsibilities.
So project manager have the responsibility to add the data sets and jobs.
And operations manager have the ability to add users.
And if some job is locked, then he can unlock it so that someone else can pick it up.
So now there is no process where you go and manually assign some tasks to a user.
User starts the task on their own.
If the job includes automatic ASR, then it will go through automatic process.
If it doesn't include automatic, then it will just do validation and splitting using VAD so that the other users can do transcription and all.
